vintageCollectorDecription: ANE has completely changed how I source vintage items. I've found rare pieces at 60% below market value because I was notified the moment they were listed.

smartWayToFindDeals: The smart way to find deals and make profits on online marketplaces.

hero.description: Create custom notifiers across multiple marketplaces and get instant alerts when items matching your criteria appear. Stay ahead of the competition with real-time updates.

features.title: Everything You Need for Marketplace Monitoring
features.description: Our platform helps you stay ahead of the competition with real-time notifications across multiple marketplaces, powerful filtering, and advanced analytics.

notifiers.title: Custom Notifiers
notifiers.description: Create personalized alerts for specific items, price ranges, or sellers across any supported marketplace. Get notified exactly when and how you want.

filters.title: Cross-Marketplace Filters
filters.description: Set up sophisticated filters that work across multiple platforms simultaneously to find exactly what you're looking for, no matter where it's listed.

alerts.title: Instant Alerts
alerts.description: Receive notifications in real-time via email, SMS, or push notifications as soon as matching items are listed. Never miss a deal again.

howItWorks.title: How ANE Works
howItWorks.description: Our platform makes it easy to set up and manage marketplace alerts in just a few simple steps.

first.title: Create an Account
first.description: Get started with ANE no login or credit card required.

second.title: Set Up Notifiers
second.description: Create custom notifiers with your specific search criteria and preferences.

third.title: Choose Notification Methods
third.description: Select how you want to be notified when matching items are found.

fourth.title: Receive Alerts
fourth.description: Receive notifications when items matching your criteria are listed.

useCases.title: Who Uses ANE?
useCases.description: Our platform is designed for a variety of users who need to stay on top of marketplace listings.

collectors.title: Collectors
collectors.description: Find rare collectibles, limited editions, and hard-to-find items across multiple marketplaces before anyone else.

resellers.title: Resellers
resellers.description: Find underpriced items to flip for profit. Get notified of deals before competitors and maximize your margins.

bargainHunters.title: Bargain Hunters
bargainHunters.description: Never miss a deal on products you want. Set up alerts for specific items and get notified when prices drop.

marketplaces.title: Supported Marketplaces
marketplaces.description: Our platform integrates with many major online and local marketplaces to give you comprehensive coverage and ensure you never miss a deal.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our customers have to say about ANE.

first.quote: ANE has completely changed how I collect vintage video games. I was able to find a rare sealed copy of Chrono Trigger that I'd been hunting for years!
first.name: Michael Thompson

second.quote: As a reseller, timing is everything. ANE has helped me increase my profits by 40% by alerting me to deals before my competition even knows they exist.
second.name: Sarah Johnson

third.quote: I was able to furnish my entire apartment with amazing deals thanks to ANE. The cross-marketplace filters are a game-changer for finding exactly what you want.
third.name: David Rodriguez

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs. No hidden fees or long-term commitments. All plans include our core features.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about ANE and how it can help you stay ahead of the competition.

first.question: What platforms are supported?
first.answer: Our service supports a wide range of popular online marketplaces, including Facebook Marketplace, Autoscout24, Kleineanzeigen, and eBay, among others. We are continuously expanding our platform integrations to provide more options.

second.question: Is there a free trial?
second.answer: We offer a completely free trial that doesn't require any login or credit card information. Experience the power of our platform risk-free and see how we can help you find what you're looking for before committing to a paid plan.

third.question: How many marketplaces can I monitor at once?
third.answer: All plans allow you to monitor all supported marketplaces simultaneously. The difference between plans is the number of active notifiers you can have and the frequency of notifications.

fourth.question: Can I customize the types of notifications I receive?
fourth.answer: Included in all tiers you can customize many things like adding blacklisted and whitelisted keywords, price range, search radius and more

fifth.question: How many marketplaces can I monitor at once?
fifth.answer: Notification speed depends on your chosen tier. Free tier users receive notifications within 1 hour. Collector tier within 10 minutes. Our upcoming Flipper tier will offer near real-time notifications

sixth.question: When will the Flipper plan be available?
sixth.answer: The Flipper plan is currently in development and will be available soon. You can join our waitlist to be notified when it launches and get early access.

cta.title: Ready to Never Miss a Deal Again?
cta.description: Join thousands of collectors and resellers who use our platform to stay ahead of the competition. Start for free today!

facebook.name: Facebook Marketplace
facebook.title: Facebook Marketplace Filters & Notifications
facebook.subtitle: Never miss great deals on Facebook Marketplace with smart filters and instant notifications

introduction.title: Transform Your Facebook Marketplace Experience
introduction.bodyText: Facebook Marketplace is one of the largest online marketplaces where millions of people buy and sell items daily. With our advanced filtering system, you can cut through the noise and find exactly what you're looking for without spending hours scrolling through irrelevant listings.

benefits.title: Why Use Facebook Marketplace Filters?
benefits.bodyText: Save time and never miss great deals with our intelligent monitoring system designed specifically for Facebook Marketplace users.
benefits.benefit1: Save hours of manual searching through Facebook Marketplace listings
benefits.benefit2: Be the first to know about new items that match your interests
benefits.benefit3: Find better deals faster with automated price and condition monitoring

ebay.name: eBay
ebay.title: eBay Filters & Notifications
ebay.subtitle: Get the best deals on eBay with custom filters and real-time alerts

introduction.title: Maximize Your eBay Shopping Experience
introduction.bodyText: eBay is a vast marketplace with millions of listings. Our platform helps you navigate this sea of options by allowing you to set up personalized filters that match your specific needs, ensuring you never miss a great deal.

benefits.title: Why Use eBay Filters?
benefits.bodyText: With our eBay filters, you can streamline your shopping experience and focus on the items that matter most to you.
benefits.benefit1: Quickly find items that match your exact criteria
benefits.benefit2: Receive instant notifications when new listings are posted
benefits.benefit3: Save time and effort with automated monitoring

craigslist.name: Craigslist
craigslist.title: Craigslist Filters & Notifications
craigslist.subtitle: Discover hidden gems on Craigslist with smart filters and alerts

introduction.title: Unlock the Potential of Craigslist
introduction.bodyText: Craigslist is a treasure trove of local listings, but finding the right items can be challenging. Our platform simplifies this process by allowing you to create custom filters that match your interests, ensuring you never miss out on great deals.

benefits.title: Why Use Craigslist Filters?
benefits.bodyText: Our Craigslist filters help you quickly find relevant listings and stay updated on new postings.
benefits.benefit1: Easily search for items in your local area
benefits.benefit2: Get notified about new listings that match your criteria

kleinanzeigen.name: Kleinanzeigen
kleinanzeigen.title: Kleinanzeigen Filters & Notifications
kleinanzeigen.subtitle: Find the best deals on Kleinanzeigen with custom filters and real-time alerts

introduction.title: Enhance Your Kleinanzeigen Experience
introduction.bodyText: Kleinanzeigen is a popular marketplace for buying and selling items locally. Our platform allows you to set up personalized filters that help you quickly find what you're looking for, making your shopping experience more efficient.

benefits.title: Why Use Kleinanzeigen Filters?
benefits.bodyText: With our Kleinanzeigen filters, you can easily navigate through listings and stay informed about new items that match your interests.
benefits.benefit1: Quickly locate items in your area that meet your criteria
benefits.benefit2: Receive instant notifications for new listings (usually within a minute after listing)
benefits.benefit3: Automate your searches to save time

autoscout24.name: Autoscout24
autoscout24.title: Autoscout24 Filters & Notifications
autoscout24.subtitle: Find your dream car on Autoscout24 with custom filters and real-time alerts

introduction.title: Simplify Your Car Search on Autoscout24
introduction.bodyText: Autoscout24 is one of the largest online car marketplaces in Europe. Our platform helps you set up personalized filters to find the perfect vehicle without wasting time on irrelevant listings.

benefits.title: Why Use Autoscout24 Filters?
benefits.bodyText: Our Autoscout24 filters allow you to focus on the cars that matter most to you, ensuring you never miss a great deal.
benefits.benefit1: Easily search for cars based on make, model, price, and location
benefits.benefit2: Get notified when new listings that match your criteria are posted
benefits.benefit3: Save time with automated monitoring of your preferred vehicles

marketplaceSteps.bodyText: Getting started with {name} monitoring is simple and takes just a few minutes to set up your personalized filters.

step1.title: Set Your Criteria
step1.description: Define your search parameters including keywords, price range, location radius, and item categories and more for {name}

step2.title: Activate Monitoring
step2.description: Our system continuously scans {name} for new listings that match your specified criteria.

step3.title: Receive Notifications
step3.description: Get instant alerts via email, push notifications or discord when relevant items appear on {name}

question1.title: How often does the system check {name}?
question1.answer: Our system monitors {name} continuously, checking for new listings as often as possible to ensure you don't miss any deals or opportunities.

question2.title: Can I set multiple filters for different items on {name}?
question2.answer: Yes, you can create multiple filters for different categories, price ranges, and locations on {name} to monitor various items simultaneously.

question3.title: Is this service affiliated with {name}?
question3.answer: No, we are an independent service that helps users monitor {name} more conveniently and efficiently. We are not affiliated with or endorsed by {name}

marketplacesFeatures.title: Powerful Features for {name}
marketplacesFeatures.description: Our platform provides comprehensive tools to enhance your {name} browsing experience with intelligent automation and real-time monitoring.

filtering.title: Advanced Filtering
filtering.description: Create custom filters based on price range, location, keywords, item condition, and more to find exactly what you need on {name}.

notifications.title: Instant Notifications
notifications.description: Get notified immediately when new items matching your criteria are posted on {name}, giving you the first opportunity to purchase.

Eg. Use search Value `Iphone 16` with `PRO` OR `16e` to get only pro and 16e models
